entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 05:07 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 9.5°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
